name: 2D Space Blaster (Windows Download)
description: This is the first game I have ever made. I used free assets from the Unity Store and a lot of Googling, but the end result is all me. I keep reading from various sources that you should release anything you make out to the public because critical feedback can be invaluable, so I thought I would put this out to see what folks think. This project was primarily academic, in other words, created specifically to teach me Unity and C#. It may not be the most fun game in the world, but I learned a lot making it!
